Durable Material: This messenger bag is made of high density canvas, durable enough and comfortable to touch. Decorated with high quality PU leather and hardware, the classic design and minimalist design make this small bag perfect for any occasion.

Structure and capacity: Structure: Inner space of this shoulder bag: 1 zipper mesh pocket and 1 zipper pocket. Capacity: This bag is large enough for 9” iPad, cell phone, wallet, keys and so on.
Key features: Adjustable strap, high quality material, scientific and reasonable capacity.
100% Customer Satisfaction: We offer 3 months return policy. Any quality problems with your bag, please feel free to contact us, we will solve it.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This messenger bag is made of high density canvas, and decorated with high quality PU leather and hardware. Single shoulder, cross body, tote, you can choose the suitable way to carry this bag. This shoulder bag is very nice for short trip, outdoors, gift giving, and everyday using. Scientific and reasonable capacity that can make your things more organized and the unique flap design can make your things more safe. Special headphone hole design that can let you enjoy your life to the fullest.
XINCADA Canvas Messenger Bag XINCADA Mens Bag Messenger Bag Canvas Shoulder Bags Travel Bag Man Purse Crossbody Bags for Work Business

The Basic Information of This Messenger Bag Specifications of the messenger bag:(small one) Size: 8.27x3.74x10.24 inches Weight: 1.21 lb Specifications of the shoulder bag:(large one) Size: 9.44x4.53x12.2 inches Weight: 1.52 lb Brand: XINCADA Color: Khaki, Coffee, Black Package includes: 1xcanvas shoulder bag

Purchasing Notes Notes: Since the size above is measured by hand, the size of the actual item you received could be slightly different from the size above. Meanwhile, please be reminded that due to lighting effects, monitor's brightness / contrast settings etc, there could be some slight differences in the color tone of the pictures and the actual item. How to maintain this canvas shoulder bag? 1.Wash it with clean water in ordinary temperature. 2.DO NOT wash it with hot water and alkaline detergent. 3.Wash Separately to avoid staining. 4.Hang to dry and store in ventilated place instead of sun exposure.

The Structures of This Messenger Bag The structure of the small one Inner space: Zipper closure. 1 zipper mesh pocket for your cell phone, small notebook, power bank, USB cable, and 1 zipper pocket for your important things. Outer space: 1 zipper pocket under the flap pocket, and this bag is suitable for an iPad mini. Inside this pocket, 1 pocket for your cell phone or power bank, 2 small pockets for your pens or pencils, 1 special key ring design that is very nice to put your keys in, and 1 special hole design in this pocket that you can let your USB cable or earphone cable through this hole. 2 side pocket in the 2 sides of this messenger bag, you can put your cell phone or other small things in. The structure of the large one Inner space of this messenger bag: 1 zipper mesh pocket, and 1 zipper pocket. Outer space of this messenger bag: Zipper closure. 1 zipper pocket with 2 open pockets, 1 small pencil pocket and 1 special key ring under the flap. 1 zipper pocket in the flap, 2 side pockets and 1 zipper pocket in the back of this bag. Key features of this bag Adjustable straps: You can adjust the length of the strap to fit you body. High quality hardware and PU leather: The zippers of the messenger bag is made of high quality hardware and decorate with PU leather, comfortable to touch and smooth to close and open the bag. Unique headphone hole design: You can listen to music during traveling or outdoors.(Put your cell phone inside this pocket and let the earphone pass through this hole, and then you can listen to music with your hands free.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, bigger size is worth it
reviews.reviewText: All-around great product, everything I could've hoped. Ships quick, great material with a great feel, great handle and overall design.You're not buying this because you need a backpack; you buy this as an everyday-carry bag if you work in an office/metro environment.The only think I might say as a negative is that the shoulder-strap is permanently affixed to it and can't be removed without cutting it off. The strap *could* be 6" longer to allow for a more comfortable backpack-style wear but it's fine, would most-definitely buy again. Great bag.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and very attractive
reviews.reviewText: Lots of pocketses! Well designed and a perfect size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great looking, and sturdy.
reviews.reviewText: Purse has strong zippers and exceeds expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars pretty good bag, good size
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bag as a backup bag and ended up buying two of them. I tried it for about a week and it fits a lot of stuff. The only caveat is that there is really only big compartment even though it is "somewhat partitioned" so when you take one item, something else my slip out or come up with the item you want to get out.There is also two handle strap which makes it a bit lopsided when you quickly grab one handle strap and not both.It worked pretty well for me, but I couldn't find a similar bag that I had before, so I settled with this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All the space and comfortablity you need in a small purse.
reviews.reviewText: This bag is amazing and just what I have been looking for. In the pictures, I dropped one piece of brightly collared item in each pouch to show the depth of it. The front zipper pocket on the flap along with the back zipper pouch is deep enough to cover my whole hand and then some above the wrist. The pouches on the inside can only submerge my whole wrist. The main biggest compartment is big enough to fit nearly my whole arm, stopping just above my elbow. If I wanted to, I could fit two DnD books inside and still have room. The main concern I have always had with purses is that when there are pouches, chances are the purse well bulge. As shown in the pictures, I could jam the thing full with random things and It will still look flat. There is also an extender on the purse. If I were to say put books in there, it would expand outwards to allow me more room. I did buy the biggest one there was but tbh, the biggest one is the best. You could either have it small with a few things in there or for traveling for hours to a day or so you could pack it with drinks, entertainment, snacks, and maybe even an extra pair in clothes if you organize just right. There are also pencil holders on both sides of the bag. Can fit 3 on each side if thin but it would be cramped. I would suggest 2 considering under the flap, you could put hesdphones and pencils on the inside. Only problem I have with the pencil holders Is that it isnt deep enough so some of my pens i can't hook it into the holder(I don't want it to slip out without noticing so it is wise to have it hooked on or not at all). My previous purse had many pouches but it would become very bulgy with only the necessary stuff that was in there(hand sanitizer, wallet, drink, Headphones, Charger, etc) so it would make it have less room. Even with the pouches on the inside of this purse filled with things, you could still feet things in the depths of it. Not to kention this purse is only a few inches taller than my old one! This is the purse I have been looking for, for a year. The strap is also surprisingly comfortable considering the material looks like some strap you would find on a cheap purse that feels scratchy. The strap on this purse defently isn't the same case. It is soft and durable, and can be adjusted to a really low height. I've had it for a couple of weeks now and it doesn't feel like it would break any time soon. I would highly recommend this purse, especially the largest size, because you defintly get your moneys worth and can't go wrong with it. Hope this review really helped everyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great men's handbag!
reviews.reviewText: Lots of zipper pockets. I've been very satisfied with my choice. It goes with me everywhere. I don't leave it at home, ... ever!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars went beyond my expectations
reviews.reviewText: - ive had this bag for about a little over half a year now, and ive used it every time i go out. it is very well made, the pockets and everything are easy to clean out in my experience. (never dealt with wet messes though like spills or anything, only ever crumbs and so forth)- the leather zipper pieces on mine arent sewn together all the way around, it doesnt bother me at all but as a nitpicky person such as myself, i know stuff like this can be a big deal for some, so i wanted to mention it- it holds a lot of stuff, i can even stuff things in it if i have no other hands to carry things and it almost always gets the job done, id say the size is very nice yet not too big!- i had bought it for my ipad pro (11 inch) that i bought last christmas because my previous bag wasnt big enough and im beyond happy i made the decision to buy this one specifically, its definitely my favorite bag in a long while.((pictures are from when i first got it back at the beginning of the year, and the zipper picture is from today, august 12th))

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024

reviews.reviewText: No es negra, es más bien azul muy oscuro, pero está bien para mí. Es muy amplia, se ve de buena calidad, gran compra por ese precio.

reviews.reviewTitle: Material super duradero y bien echo
reviews.reviewText: En lo personal tenia mis dudas pero es de buena calidad la lona las cremalleras las correas todo y sus apartados esta bien reforzada
Good quality product, confortable to wear and has lots of space!

I'm extremely happy with this bag. The color seems like what I expected (I wouldn't have really cared if it was different, I just didn't want black or grey), it didn't smell, have stains or anything strange going on with it.It holds my Amazon Fire HD 10 (11th Generation) 2021 AND it's Bluetooth Keyboard - or my Vastking Kingpad K10 Pro Tablet - with it's slightly larger keyboard - without any issues. I had a real problem finding a bag that could fit the Vastking, with it's pen. In fact I just put both in, for fun, with their keyboard cases - and BOTH fit, which I was NOT expecting. BONUS!!I already have a smaller hardcover notebook in it, a battery pack, my Galaxy S21 phone, a few cables and a charger - it could easily hold more. Lots more. I have another bag, which I do use for all my 'extras' - I wouldn't actually need it for this bag. That said, if you want quick, organized access to various smaller things a different bag might be suitable (I shot it's picture for comparison, the grey one).It has many pockets, far more than I need, including two on the side. Might fit a small H20 bottle - but in a million years I wouldn't put liquid near computer equipment to ever find out. There were two listed when I bought mine ($17). It doesn't look used or returned. It was packaged well and all the zippers work. The others are listed at more than double that price. Unless they are larger (which they don't appear to be) $40 - $50 isn't worth it, at all. But the $17 I paid most definitely was worth it. I is going to be easier to cart this one around, plus it looks much nicer, than my storage case and it could hold everything I have in that storage case if I wanted. But I would have to go 'digging' to find the things I wanted.I would also say it is not something to be hung off a bicycle, or smashed around on a major bush tour or something (I have that kind of stuff, too, for my camera equipment). But it is a good, basic bag, with loads of room ( seeing as it held my two tablets and my cell phone plus my junk- and that was at best 50% of the space). Would happily rec'd this!
Esta increíble, los materiales y el diseño son muy buenos. La entrega fue rapidísima. Excelente producto y servicio. Lo recomiendo. 👍🏽
